<p><strong>Glucose:</strong> carbohydrate essential for energy metabolism. Provides energy for cells.</p>

<p><strong>Lecithin:</strong> phospholipid with a natural emulsifying function. Used in the food and pharmaceutical industries.</p>

<a href="https://chemapps.stolaf.edu/jmol/jmol.php?&pdbid=3i40">

<p><strong>Insulin:</strong> hormone that regulates blood glucose. Stimulates the entry of glucose into cells.</p>
